instruction: Where can I find detailed instructions on installation and cleaning for my Samsung refrigerator?
response: For detailed instructions on installation and cleaning, visit the Samsung website at http://www.samsung.com. Navigate to the Support section, enter the model name of your refrigerator, and access support materials specific to your model. These resources provide comprehensive guidance for both installation and maintenance, ensuring the appliance operates correctly and efficiently.

instruction: Where can I find detailed instructions on installation and cleaning for my Samsung refrigerator?
response: To find detailed installation and cleaning instructions, go to the Samsung website at http://www.samsung.com. These resources offer thorough guidance for proper installation and maintenance, helping ensure your appliance functions properly and efficiently.

instruction: How can I check the model name of my Samsung refrigerator?

instruction: How do I access the online resources for my Samsung refrigerator via QR code?
response: Open a QR code scanner app on your smartphone and scan the QR code image attached to your refrigerator. This code gives you quick access to resources such as product registration, the manual, and customer support. Having these resources easily accessible ensures you can quickly find answers and assistance when needed.

instruction: How do I access the online resources for my Samsung refrigerator via QR code?
response: Launch a QR code scanning application on your phone and use it to scan the QR code found on your refrigerator. This code provides instant access to important resources like product registration, the user manual, and customer support. Keeping these resources within easy reach allows you to swiftly obtain information and assistance when necessary.
